description:
► DOWNLOAD Calming NOW and join the world’s healthiest and happiest community and fast track your journey to the meditation world! Get it now to start improving your life and enjoy our special programs!

► WHY DOWNLOAD IT NOW? BECAUSE OF:

◆ #3 in Apple’s "New Apps We Love", May 2017

◆ "Calming is the best meditating app which you can find in the App Store." — LifeHacker.com

◆ "Calming is the most comprehensive meditation app with a bunch of different features and premium quality." — AppAdvice.com

◆ "Use Calming if you want to relief the stress. It's worth it." — Mashable.com

◆ "It has never been easier to relax, than using Calming" — MacWorld.co.uk

◆ "People this app company is giving you a wonderful gift, take advantage of it! I own many meditating apps, this app is one of the best. Great features, meditations, relaxations and sleep in one app, also as a breathing, journal, very clear graphs, great info about your progress, a lot of tips and much more. GOD BLESS THE PEOPLE BEHIND THIS APP. WHAT A GIFT OF LOVE." — Oinjjkok

◆ "It's a big pleasure to use the app. Never expected to love this." — Kirklack



And more:

Our mission is helping people live their best life through live-changing meditation. This means giving people the confidence, strength and happiness they need to achieve their goals.

Calming is the #1 app for mindfulness and meditation to bring more clarity, joy and peace to your daily life. Join the millions experiencing less anxiety and more happiness by practicing meditation daily! 

***Recommended by top psychologists and mental health experts to help you de-stress.   Calming is the perfect meditation app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users. 



► Download it now and start training your mind for a healthier and happier life!



MEDITATE JUST 15 MINUTES EVERY DAY AND GET DOZENS OF BENEFITS:

• It improves creativity and concentration
• It boosts your brain's efficiency and memory
• It helps you to make better decisions
• It helps you to focus on work or study
• It keeps you safe from depression, stress and anxiety
• It makes you smile more and improves your mood
• It helps you sleep better and wake up easily 
• It improves your relationships
• It makes you more present and a better listener
• It gives you experience peace of mind and a greater mind-body connection
• It increases self-awareness and greater sense of perspective
• It increases the energy level, as you gain an inner source of energy
• It improves the immune system, decreases any tension-related pain, such as, tension headaches, ulcers, insomnia, muscle and joint problems
• It lowers your risk of catching a cold, high blood pressure
• And so much more....



► Why are you still reading? Get all listed benefits! Download it now and start improving your life!



 THANKS

Thank you for your FEEDBACK! We really appreciate it very much! We are constantly making new updates with new features to improve the app and make you happier with a better product!

RATE the app and SHARE your thoughts on the AppStore Page! Your FEEDBACK motivates us to work harder and update the app more frequently! 

Have a suggestion or comment? Shoot us an email - bizi.apps@mail.ru



► Why not to download it and start improving you life today?



PREMIUM 

Calming offers auto-renewing subscription options: usd19.99/month, usd99.99/year.
These prices are for US customers. Pricing in other countries may be converted to your local currency.
Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings. Calming also offers a Forever subscription which is paid for by a one-off upfront payment of usd159.00.

Terms of Service: http://bizi-apps.com/calming/terms-of-service.pdf
Privacy Policy: http://bizi-apps.com/calming/privacy-policy.pdf
releaseNotes:
While you're waiting for the update to install, try this simple practice: get comfortable, and turn your attention to the breath. Don't try to change the breath, just notice it as it comes in to your body, and as it flows out. Now try counting “one” with each in-breath, and “two” on the out-breath. Count up to 10 and then start over at one. Continue this cycle for as long as you need to.
What's New:
• more than 50 small changes which make app more convenient to use
• fixed minor bugs and stability improved

Thanks for your Feedback! We appreciate it very much! We are constantly making updates with new features to improve the app and make your experience better!
Please Rate the app and Share your thoughts on the AppStore page! Your feedback motivates us to work harder and update the app more frequently!

Cheers!
